articles.author: WKRC Staff
articles.title: Man dies of brain-eating amoeba after rinsing sinuses with tap water, officials say - KATU
articles.description: A Florida man is dead after rinsing his sinuses with tap water, the county's health department said.

articles.title: Treating asthma is critical to living with it - The Washington Post
articles.description: Experts are still trying to pin down why there are so many cases of the condition today.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
I used to think asthma was a condition you either had or didnt, and that it was typically diagnosed in childhood.
That changed when I was diagnosed with asthma in my 50s.
